Single service, no external integrations, no infrastructure changes needed - just improving the matching algorithm logic.

scope.notes: Primary changes in matcher.py (~1000 lines), processor.py for integration, and test files. Single Python service with contained scope.

key_findings.proposed_solution: Sport-first detection → season determination → both-team validation → date proximity filtering
